missionProperties.missionDescription: Heroes must bring a Spectre ally to this mission. If the heroes have not earned a Spectre ally, they earn one Spectre ally of their choice for this mission only. ==== The Empire has imprisoned several Wookiees who rose up against their overseers. The Empire is threatening to harm these captives' families if they do not turn in the other Wookiees and Rebel agents who helped them. A member of the Spectres is on the way to help you get those families out of danger and deprive the Empire of this leverage.
missionProperties.campaignName: Sabine Wren & Zeb Orrelios Ally Pack
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the rope ladders.
missionProperties.additionalMissionInfo: Heroes must bring a Spectre ally to this mission. If they have not earned one, they earn one Spectre ally of their choice for this mission only.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

events.eventText:
You wade through the damp jungle around you, looking up in awe at the treetop constructions that serve as the Wookiees’ homes. As you approach the coordinates of the Imperial outpost threatening the captive Wookiees’ families, a shout and a blaster bolt breaks your reverie, and you turn to face your attackers.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.

eventActions.tbText: Rope ladders connect the Wookiee tree dwellings to the ground.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A rope ladder leads up into one of the Wookiee homes.

{-} Spaces with rope ladders are difficult terrain.
{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space with a rope ladder, click the rope ladder and select "Climb up".

You start to make your way towards the Wookiees' homes.

{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels enter the tree dwellings.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
With the Empire repulsed, the Wookiee families lead you in a traditional local celebration ritual. You hasten to signal that the prisoners’ families are safe.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} If playing asa side mission, heroes receive 1 Spectre ally of their choice as an ally.

eventActions.mainText: Are you playing this mission as part of the "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
With blaster bolts whizzing past you and the Imperial numbers continuing to swell, you are forced to abandon your mission. The prisoners, and their families, remain in jeopardy.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.mainText: Are you playing this mission as part of the "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
"Our agents have signaled to the captured Wookiees that their families are safe," Hera says upon your return from Kashyyyk. "They won't be providing any useful information to the Empire now."

She lets her gaze wander to you, eyeing you intently. "No one suffers as much from the Empire as the Wookiees. That's another reason why we fight."

{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

eventActions.tbText:
Aboard the Ghost, you find Hera and Sabine scrutinizing the remains of an E-XD infiltrator droid. “We've found more than one of these things trying to follow us lately,’" Hera says. “And Thrawn isn't letting up. We need to even the odds.”

“So we give them something else to worry about,” suggests Sabine. “Even if it only ties up some stormtroopers. We didn't get to stay on Geonosis long enough for me to check, but I think we might be able to get some of those old battle droids working.”

“Or,” Hera puts in, “we can try to help the Twi'lek rebels on Ryloth. The Empire’s been intercepting their supplies for a while now. If we can help them put up more of a fight, that will be one more thing for Thrawn to worry about.”

{-} The heroes collectively choose whether to check out the droid factory or assist the Twi'lek rebels.
{-} If the heroes choose to check out the droid factory, the next active mission is “Siege on Geonosis”.
{-} If the heroes choose to assist the Twi'lek rebels, the next active mission is “Race on Ryloth”.

events.eventText:
Hera looks tense as you return to the Ghost. "We have ordered all agents on Kashyyyk to go into hiding immediately. This will set our plans back several months, but at least they'll be safe in case the Wookiees talk."

Despite her silence, you sense how concerned Hera is about the agents. "You can't always win," she finally says. "The main thing is to win the battles that matter."

{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

“So we give them something else to worry about,” suggests Sabine. “Even if it only ties up some stormtroopers. We didn't get to stay on Geonosis long enough for me to check, but I think we might be able to get some of those old battle droids working.”

“Or,” Hera puts in, “we can try to help the Twi'lek rebels on Ryloth. The Empire’s been intercepting their supplies for a while now. If we can help them put up more of a fight, that will be one more thing for Thrawn to worry about.”

events.eventText:
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
You climb up into the heights of Kashyyyk's gigantic trees. From here, you can see both tree dwellings well.

eventActions.tbText: Old supply crates contain some of the Wookiee's belongings that might be useful.

{-} Spaces with rope ladders are difficult terrain.

eventActions.tbText: As you hoped, the family members of the captive Wookiees can be found in the dwellings.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Ifruhrr, the young cousin of one of the captive Wookiees, is hiding in the corner here.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Ifruhrr can spend 2 movement points to claim him.

Trraschirr, a Wookiee craftsman, is helplessly clenching his fists and roaring at the Imperials.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Trraschirr can spend 2 movement points to claim him.

Rerrrercu, the old, grey-furred grandmother of one of the captive Wookiees, blinks with old eyes.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Rerrrercu can spend 2 movement points to claim her.

Morrsoobhe, a fierce Wookiee warrior, growls at the Imperials, unable to break the binders that tie her.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Morrsoobhe can spend 2 movement points to claim her.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent Wookiees. A Rebel figure adjacent to a Wookiee can spend 2 movement points to claim it.
{-} When all 4 Wookiees have been claimed and all heroes are on the extraction zone (green highlight), the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes are extracted.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
These are the coordinates your pilot gave you for your extraction.

{-} When all 4 Wookiees have been claimed and all heroes are on the extraction zone (green highlight), the heroes are extracted.

events.eventText: The Empire has erected a terrifying gunnery station in the tree house, the barrel aimed at you.
The Empire has erected a terrifying gunnery station in the tree house, the barrel aimed at you.
You help Rerrrercu up and hurry the old Wookiee lady towards the exit.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Rerrrercu, the old, grey-furred grandmother of one of the captive Wookiees, blinks with old eyes.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Rerrrercu can spend 2 movement points to claim her.

events.eventText: You quickly pick the lock on Morrsoobhe's binders. The warrior growls and rushes out.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Morrsoobhe, a fierce Wookiee warrior, growls at the Imperials, unable to break the binders that tie her.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Morrsoobhe can spend 2 movement points to claim her.

events.eventText: You quickly talk to Ifruhrr, who nods and hurries towards the door.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Ifruhrr, the young cousin of one of the captive Wookiees, is hiding in the corner here.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Ifruhrr can spend 2 movement points to claim him.

events.eventText: You grab Trraschirr at the elbow and hustle him towards the exit.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Trraschirr, a Wookiee craftsman, is helplessly clenching his fists and roaring at the Imperials.

{-} A Rebel figure adjacent to a Trraschirr can spend 2 movement points to claim him.

events.eventText: Reveal South
The Wookiee roars in appreciation and relief, then directs you to a series of ropes cleverly hidden in the trees.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A rope bridge connects the tree house to the ground.

{-} Imperial mission tokens represent rope bridges. Figures can move between spaces with rope bridges of the same color as though the spaces were adjacent.

events.eventText: More Imperial forces rush in to stop you from rescuing the Wookiees.
As you start to make your way to the extraction zone, you spot a tall trooper in black armor guarding it.

eventActions.tbText: {-} The Rebels cannot be extracted as long as the Sentry Trooper is on the map.

eventActions.repositionText: Block access to the extraction zone (green highlight).

events.eventText:
With the sentry gone, the way to escape is open.

{-} When all heroes are on the extraction zone (green highlight), the heroes are extracted. Click the extraction zone and select "Extract".
